Item ID1125

The black platebody is the fourth-best standard platebody, requiring a Defence level of 10 to equip. It cannot be made using the Smithing skill and has the same bonuses as a white platebody, excluding the Prayer bonus.

A black platebody is used in King's Ransom and Heroes' Quest if you're part of the Black Arm Gang.

 Attack bonuses
+0+0+0-30-15
 Defence bonuses
+41+40+30-6+40
 Other bonusesSlot
